ComicInfo.Title: Burning Down the House
ComicInfo.Summary:
In the red corner: a titanic space armada with the last word in planet-busting weaponry. And facing them: the Esseverine, a peaceful people with no technology or tools at all. Nothing. Not even a pointy stick. But they do have Barbarella. Place your bets!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Eric Powell | 1 | B | Cover B | Ryan Browne & Addison Duke | 2 | C | Cover C | Kyle Strahm & Baldemar Rivas | 3 | D | Cover D | Ediano Silva & Dinei Ribeiro | 4 | E | Subscription Cover | Kenan Yarar & Mohan | 5 | F/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Eric Powell | 6 | G/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Kyle Strahm | 7 | H/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Ryan Browne & Addison Duke | 8 | I/RI | 1:40 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Ediano Silva | 9 | J/RI | 1:50 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Kenan Yarar | 10 |
